descriptions:
["DescriptionThe Noble House Real Estate is proud to offer another outstanding villa for sale in the prestigious, most sought after community in Dubai, Emirates Hills home of  Dubai's elite personalities. 
This extraordinary mansion boasts a beautifully landscaped plot size area of 27,000 sq.ft with a Built Up Area of 20,800 sq.ft offering luxury 8 bedrooms ensuite overlooking the golf course and Dubai skyline.
The property is elegantly designed with top of the line luxury furnitures and fixtures made by well known brands from Europe. From customized double height doors and windows, water jet floorings and walls, classic decorative ceilings to grand staircase, this home is truly bespoke. The mansion is can be sold either with or without furnitures and some of the home's impressive features includes:
• Lift
• Gym
• 2 Kitchens 
• Spacious lawn
• Barbecue area
• Wine Cellar
• Home Cinema
• Staff accommodations
• Well-manicured garden
• Jet setted en suite bathrooms
• Jacuzzi, Sauna and Steam room
• Basement that can accommodate 9 cars
Emirates Hills is the flagship community of Emirates Living, the most sought-after community in Dubai where high net worth individuals live – consisting of exclusive custom-built properties offering amazing views.
For more details of the property and for viewing arrangement, pls call The Noble House Real Estate at +97144566135 or visit our website at www.tnh.ae."]

descriptions:
["DescriptionYAS Properties are pleased to offer you this fantastic one bedroom apartment for SALE in one of the most amazing communities of Ras Al Khaimah - Mina Al Arab. 
This one bedroom with the area of 628 sq.ft. comes in with two washrooms. The apartment has an open kitchen. It has a ceramic tiles flooring. The bedroom is with the built in wardrobes and en-suite. 
Other than this a variety of leisure activities are available, a football pitch, lagoon walk, dance classes. For dining, there are multiple restaurants with variety of cuisines including India, Korean, Vietnamese, Lebanese Etc. For socializing, a number of coffee shops are open just overlooking the amazing marina of Mina Al Arab. For necessaries, Supermarket, Pharmacy is available. Also salons for ladies and gents. There is a swimming pool and the kids play area as well. The Gold's Gym is available here.
This one bedroom is available with the MOST AMAZING PRICE in the market. 
About Mina Al Arab:
Mina Al Arab was shaped keeping nature in the focus of everything in it. For this reason, a majority of the development is devoted to preserving and showcasing the core of life in ecological preserves. Occurring as natural coastal wetlands and dunes, the ecological district at Mina Al Arab is home to a variety of fascinating marine life you cannot stop admiring."]

descriptions: ["DescriptionTurnkey Properties is pleased to offer, this vacant Type 2E which enjoys great family accommodation of three bedrooms, a study and maid's room. The three dedicated bedrooms are all upstairs, the master bedroom with a walk-in changing area and wardrobes is fully en-suite with a lovely balcony overlooking to the rear garden and the lake. Bedrooms two and three share a modern suite with a bathroom and shower. In addition, there is study room upstairs with a balcony.\nDownstairs enjoys great large living area which looks out onto the well manicured garden, the kitchen and adjacent dining area look out onto the landscaped garden. The ground floor is as well very bright and spacious. The built-up area of this Type 2E is approximately 2,750 sq ft and this villa has a big plot size of 3,124 sq ft which also happens to be a corner unit. There is covered parking for two cars and even visitors to park temporarily."]

descriptions:
['Description• 3 Bed plus Maids, Serenia, West Wing
 • Stunning Sea Views
 • Brand New Never Lived In
 • VACANT 15th February 2020
 • Floor to Ceiling windows throughout
 • 5* Beach Club, Pool and Gym facilities
 • Two Designated Underground Parking Space
 • Two Blaconies
 • BUA: 2895 sqft
 • *** CONTACT KERRY (BRN:30564)
A brand new stunning 3 bed plus maids is available in Serenia, West wing on the Palm Jumeirah Crescent. 
This apartment is luxurious and has been finished to the highest of quality; including floor to ceiling windows throughout the apartment which creates a bright and airy feeling as you enter. The kitchen is open and fully intergrated with Miele appliances, the balcony runs both sides of the living space with fully retractable doors.  The master bedroom is spacious with a lots of wardrobe space and ensuite. There are also two other bedrooms with ensuites.  There is also a maids room located opposite the front door. 
Vacant on 15th February 2020.
5* facilities are located in the West Wing and include; Stunning infinity swimming pool, beach, tennis and basketball courts, valet parking, outdoor BBQ area, state of the art Gym.']
